column6: Peggy, Howard and Woody go to the ends of the earth to find... half of the puzzle?! - Who's running the last gulag in town? Hydra! That's who! And who's the woman hiding among them? Who is the man named Vanko? And why can't Woody trust a talking bear? When interests collide, worlds crack open as Immonen and Ellis continue their rampage across Siberia!
column8: | artist:Rich Ellis | writer:Kathryn Immonen | penciller (cover):Michael Komarck
